WITH T AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CASE WHEN FIXING_END_DATE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RNUM, F.NOTICE_BRD_NO, A.EMP_NM, F.NOTICE_BRD_SE_CD, B.CMMN_CD_NM, F.NOTICE_BRD_CN, F.NOTICE_BRD_SJ, F.FIXING_END_DATE, F.WRITNG_DATE, F.RDCNT FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_BRD_NO, EMP_NO, NOTICE_BRD_SE_CD, NOTICE_BRD_CN, NOTICE_BRD_SJ, WRITNG_DATE, FIXING_END_DATE, RDCNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_BRD_NO) DESC ) F, EMPLOYEE A, COMMON_CODE B WHERE F.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO AND F.NOTICE_BRD_SE_CD = B.CMMN_CD AND B.CMMN_CD_GROUP = 'BRD001'
) SELECT * FROM T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage}* 10) - (10 - 1) AND (#{currentPage}* 10) ORDER BY RNUM

LEVEL AS LVL, (SELECT B.CMMN_CD_NM FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.CMMN_CD_GROUP = 'EMP002' AND B.CMMN_CD = (SELECT C.POSITION_CD FROM EMPLOYEE C WHERE C.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO)) AS CMMN_CD_NM, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT D WHERE D.DEPT_NO = (SELECT E.DEPT_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E WHERE E.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO)) AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) AS EMP_NM, (SELECT PROFL_IMAGE_URL FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) PROFL_IMAGE_URL FROM NOTICE_BOARD_REPLY A START WITH A.UPPER_RE IS NULL AND A.NOTICE_BRD_NO = #{noticeBrdNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.NOTICE_BRD_RE_NO = A.UPPER_RE ORDER SIBLINGS BY TO_NUMBER(A.NOTICE_BRD_RE_NO)

SELECT A.NOTICE_BRD_RE_NO , A.RE_SJ , B.EMP_NM , A.EMP_NO , A.WRITNG_DATE , A.NOTICE_BRD_NO , A.UPPER_RE , C.DEPT_NM , D.CMMN_CD_NM , B.PROFL_IMAGE_URL FROM NOTICE_BOARD_REPLY A , EMPLOYEE B , DEPARTMENT C , COMMON_CODE D WHERE NOTICE_BRD_NO = #{noticeBrdNo} AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND C.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO AND B.POSITION_CD = D.CMMN_CD AND CMMN_CD_GROUP = 'EMP002' AND A.NOTICE_BRD_RE_NO = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_BRD_RE_NO)) FROM NOTICE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE NOTICE_BRD_NO =#{noticeBrdNo})
